DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to evaluate the safety and tolerability of single escalating doses of Peptide YY3-36 and to determine effects on food intake and serum hormones when administered by intravenous infusion to otherwise healthy overweight adult subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Safety, Toleration and Pharmacokinetics of Single Intravenous Doses of Peptide YY in Overweight Adults
DOC.criteria: BMI 2735 kg/m2 Women of childbearing potential
